post.text: Donald Trump's economic plan: Lower wages, fewer jobs, more debt, and tax breaks for the 0.1%.

comment.author: Kassie
comment.text: You've said you're raising taxes on the middle class and you will increase the debt much more significantly than Trump. Wages will increase under Trump once business taxes are lowered, investments are made, and people are hired. He actually said he will tax the .01% so please stop misinforming people.

replies.author: Nicole
replies.text: Kassie that sure worked for the bullshiter. Ragon the worst years of my life interest record high. Record homes repossessed. And Ronnie the bullshiter.who never sweat working.dreamed of trickle down economics . Larry
